dialog.text: top 3/5 is cloud. bottom part is grass with 1/6 area of water surface near the edge. very small area of tree on the middle left separating the cloud and grass.
no clear blue sky, just a cloudy day? how tall for the trees?
there are very small proportion (triangle area) on the right of the sky is blue. Other part is cloudy. The trees are very far away, so it is around 1cm on height.
the trees are about the right size, but it is on the left side of the image. The sky is with blue tone with white cloud. The whole area of grass and trees can lower 1/6.
yes,  there is a reflection near the bottom 1/4 area
then should I make bigger for the water to reach 1/4 of the reflection?
i think the water area of the previous drawing are about the same size. I don't have anymore peek now.
For the image I have, there are almost 3/5 is cloudy sky, 1/3 is grass and tree on the middle left, 1/6 of the water with reflection
thats sounds right! there are also mountains, just about the same size and location as the tree, from right to the middle in the image.
So, the trees are on the middle left side of the image and the mountains are on the middle right that separate the sky and the grass?
the trees are from left to 1/8 of middle; the mountains are is the other part.
